title: Masters in This Hall
description: John Garland was in love: now he's in disgrace. He's jobless, alone, and determined to avenge himself on the thief who ruined his life. All he wants for Christmas is to see Barnaby Littimer in gaol.Barnaby has secured a job running the extravagant traditional Christmas at a rich man's country house. John intends to thwart whatever he's up to.But amid the festivity, the halls are decked with unexpected dangers. And John will need to decide if he can trust Barnaby one more time...
author: K.J. Charles
